api_list.api_description: Returns price data of a single cryptocurrency.

optional_parameters.name: quotes
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of quotes to return

api_list.api_description: Get ticker information for all or requested markets.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: Asset pair to get data for (optional, default: all tradeable exchange pairs)

query: What is the current price of Bitcoin in USD as reported by Coinpaprika, and can you also provide the ticker information for the BTC/USD pair from Kraken?
